name: Survive the Beach
description:
WASD or arrow keys to move, and click to shoot

This is a game where you play as an alien who has crash landed on some remote planet called "Earth" and on this planet there is a beach with terrifying flesh eating crabs, you must kill the crabs to survive the beach and live another day. If you return to your crashed ship you can heal yourself instantly! This was my first game so it isn't that big, I would love to hear what you all think about it!
